name: DELIVER / OUT Workflow Template
description: Packages tested deliverables and supporting evidence for VERIFY and release approvals.
inputs: job.stage MUST equal DELIVER and job.subflow MUST equal OUT.
tests_pass MUST already be TRUE from PROCESS.
Guards MUST hold, job.halted MUST be FALSE, lock MUST remain active.
Operator MUST specify release packaging format (docs, binaries, specs).
steps: Summarize deliverables, version hashes, and storage paths inside artifact_path.
Link each deliverable to evidence in test_log plus any additional documents.
Document outstanding release blockers and map them to approvals required during VERIFY.
Confirm packaging works on Windows and WSL paths, adjusting instructions if needed.
outputs: artifact_path enumerating deliverables, evidence, and release blockers.
Updated manifest listing how to reproduce builds/tests.
acceptance: Every deliverable MUST reference a verification artifact or log entry.
Outstanding blockers MUST include owner, mitigation, and due expectation.
Packaging instructions MUST be reproducible on Windows and WSL.
